ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
JSON.parse(result).data.list.map(o=>{
    var bid = o.id;
    var option = JSON.stringify({'method':'POST','body':'_time=1568281576&_access_token=70c65dcbebf421dbab82e3af6521a051&bookId=' + bid});
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://app.quyuedu.hzquyue.com/v2/book.html,'+ option)).data;
    return {
       name:  o.title,
       author:o.nickname,
       tags:  J.category,
       num: J.char_num+'å­—',
       latest: 'ç¬¬' + J.last_chapter.chapter_num + 'ç«  ' + J.last_chapter.title+String(java.timeFormat(Number(J.last_update_time)*1000)).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'ï¼ˆ$1ï¼‰'),
       intro: o.introduction,
       cover: o.front_cover.replace(/_.*/,'_96x137'),
       catalogUrl: '/book/chapterList.html,'+ option
    }
});
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author<js>var æ–¯=['trim','replace'];(function(æ–‡,å‚){var å¤=function(å¸Œ){while(--å¸Œ){æ–‡['push'](æ–‡['shift']());}};å¤(++å‚);}(æ–¯,0x12e));var æ–‡=function(è‰¾,è—¤){è‰¾=è‰¾-0x0;var å‚=æ–¯[è‰¾];return å‚;};String(result)[æ–‡('0x1')](/\S+[:ï¼š]/,'')[æ–‡('0x0')]();</js>
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  wordCount: J.select('#count span').eq(1).text(),
  intro: J.select('#bookintro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author<js>var æ–¯=['trim','replace'];(function(æ–‡,å‚){var å¤=function(å¸Œ){while(--å¸Œ){æ–‡['push'](æ–‡['shift']());}};å¤(++å‚);}(æ–¯,0x12e));var æ–‡=function(è‰¾,è—¤){è‰¾=è‰¾-0x0;var å‚=æ–¯[è‰¾];return å‚;};String(result)[æ–‡('0x1')](/\S+[:ï¼š]/,'')[æ–‡('0x0')]();</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var toc = J.select('#chapterList a')
  .toArray()
  .map(function (el) {
    return {
      text: el.text(),
      href: el.attr('href'),
    };
  });

var latestChapterUrl = J.select('[og:novel:latest_chapter_url]').attr(
  'content'
);

if (!String(latestChapterUrl).includes(toc[toc.length - 1].url)) {
  toc.push({
    text: J.select('[og:novel:latest_chapter_name]').attr('content'),
    href: latestChapterUrl,
  });
}

toc;
</js>
